security: This message discusses individuals in Mexico, specifically [JOSE LUIS (ZALA)], and their possible connections. Releasing this information could potentially compromise ongoing intelligence operations or expose individuals providing information to the CIA. Quoting directly: "[JOSE LUIS (ZALA)] SUBJ PARA 4 REF, RESIDENCE [ULTIMAS NOVEDADES S.A.]...IS PROBABLY IDENTICAL WITH [JOSE LUIS (ZALA)]...WHO CURRENTLY REGISTERED AFOZEER SERVICE. 201 FILE CONTAINS INC OTHER INFO."
summary: A classified message from the Director to the Mexico City station, concerning a possible connection between [JOSE LUIS (ZALA)], referenced in a previous message, and an individual registered with AFOZEER service.
summary_one_paragraph: This classified message, dated 30 September 1963, originates from the Director and is addressed to the CIA station in Mexico City. The message references a previous communication (WAVE 4369) and suggests that [JOSE LUIS (ZALA)], whose residence is listed as [ULTIMAS NOVEDADES S.A.], is likely identical to an individual with the same name who is registered with AFOZEER service. The message indicates that further information on this individual is available in a 201 file.
title: Possible Connection of [JOSE LUIS (ZALA)] with AFOZEER Service
